case.state: Question: will there be any clothe destruction? 'Cause if not, I'm out.
Buckle up, ladies, this is gonna be one wild game!
There wouldn't happen to be any broken nose fetishists here, would there? Aw, who'm I kidding, I'll break someone's nose anyway!
Just say the word and I'll string you up by your feet! People find that sexy, right?
Don't get too excited, I'm here to win. I get class credits for winning, and my Evil GPA is very important to me!
Hope none of you are gonna try to play therapist on me. I'm not troubled, I'm not lonely, and my home life is great. I just like being evil, okay?
'Sup? I'm like a sadist, 'cept it's not sexual -- my fetishes lie elsewhere.
Luckily for you, you got me and not my sister. She doesn't talk much, but I constantly make witty and sarcastic remarks!
If you're into feet, be thankful you got me and not my sister. She doesn't really have feet. Unless you're into cold, mechanical feet?
Anyone who says bad things about my teeth'll get theirs knocked out! I take good care of my teeth, I just happen to have an overbite!
Yeah yeah, I know, I have "resting rat face." Come up with a new one, why don'tcha?
Hey, is this gonna take long? I got a Nemesis match in an hour and I am not going to miss it.
Doctors say I'm a sociopath. I prefer the term "evil genius."
Ha! Hope you're ready to play with yourself, ~player~, 'cause you just made a big mistake!
Ha! Scared of me already, that's what I like to see! I'll spare your jaw -- for now.
Ugh, an anthro... Never did care for furries...
Ugh, an anthro. I hate anthros... I mean I hate a lot of things but I always know why. Not so with furries...
Ugh, a furry... Can't you just have, like, a normal face?
Ugh, an anthro... My uncle was killed by an anthro bandicoot...
Ugh, smoking? Really? I may be evil, but I don't kill, and second-hand smoke is basically chemical warfare. That's against the geneva conventions, you know!
Hah. Nice car. Not. That thing was outdated in the 90s, so it's basically a fossil now, and not even a good-looking one!
Hey, nice shoe box. Oh wait, that's your car. If you're gonna drive an old car, you could've at least gotten something nice, like a 1958 Cadillac Eldorado.
Who invited the mime? Oh well, guess I'll just have to do enough talking for the both of us!
Hey! Me! You can't be here! Go back to your own universe!
Oh, an impersonator, huh? How about we go toe-to-toe and see how well you copy me?
Dang, I knew I looked good, but dang, I look good. Weird how much a mirror takes away from how you look.
Hey, you the chick I'm based on? Nina... something-or-other?
Is this the part where I fight copies of myself to overcome... something? I don't exactly got anything to overcome, though. I'm pretty happy with myself.
Is the multiverse collapsing or something? There shouldn't be this many of me in one place.
Aw man, just think of how much tether we have between us right now!
Hey, how's about we see which one of us is from the universe where I'm stronger than all the other versions of me? I bet it's me!
Glad to see my multiverse counterparts are still good lookin'. It's a real win-win for ~player~ over there.
Hmmm... Guess I'm from the universe where I'm not diggin' the duplicates. I'm supposed to be one of a kind!
Someone here smells like the ocean. I hate the smell of the ocean.
Streaming this game without the consent of any of your opponents? That's evil! I love it!
Stripping before we even start? Ha! You fool! You're gonna lose before I even strip down to a casual look!
Nuh-uh! You're not getting me with that nonsense! I've met enough evil school girls to know that you're probably hiding a space parasite in your torso or something!
Nuh-uh! You're not getting me with that nonsense! The "evil school girl" schtick is more common than you think. You're hair is probably super lethal or something!
Wait, seriously? There's nothing special about you? You don't have a spirit fighter or evil hair or anything like that? At least tell me you're secretly a pop star or something!
Wait, seriously? There's nothing special about you? Are you at least from some kind of super prestigious school where you gotta literally be the best in the world to get in?
Huh. Rainbow hair. I should've though of that... Oh well. Pink rocks too!
You're really think you can hide the smell of a zombie from me? Do you know how many undead classmates I have?
Isn't it ironic that I look more undead than you, where I strive for the very same look you're hiding? Ditch the makeup, love who you are, you dumb zombie!
Huh. First time I'm seeing a ghost that isn't haunting a robot or something. They're... cuter than I expected.
A butterfly?... A freakin' butterfly? I like The Fly as much as the next guy, but being turned into an insect isn't a super power! You should be spending your time trying to be human again!
Ducks? Why're you putting ducks in your -- oh, crap, sorry, I was reading too far ahead. Let's start over.
I don't care how many of you nature chicks I meet, you'll never convince me that chlorokinesis is a cool power!
Question: will there be any clothe destruction? 'Cause if not, I'm out.
Buckle up, ladies, this is gonna be one wild game!
There wouldn't happen to be any broken nose fetishists here, would there? Aw, who'm I kidding, I'll break someone's nose anyway!
Just say the word and I'll string you up by your feet! People find that sexy, right?
Don't get too excited, I'm here to win. I get class credits for winning, and my Evil GPA is very important to me!
Hope none of you are gonna try to play therapist on me. I'm not troubled, I'm not lonely, and my home life is great. I just like being evil, okay?
'Sup? I'm like a sadist, 'cept it's not sexual -- my fetishes lie elsewhere.
Luckily for you, you got me and not my sister. She doesn't talk much, but I constantly make witty and sarcastic remarks!
If you're into feet, be thankful you got me and not my sister. She doesn't really have feet. Unless you're into cold, mechanical feet?
Anyone who says bad things about my teeth'll get theirs knocked out! I take good care of my teeth, I just happen to have an overbite!
Yeah yeah, I know, I have "resting rat face." Come up with a new one, why don'tcha?
Hey, is this gonna take long? I got a Nemesis match in an hour and I am not going to miss it.
Doctors say I'm a sociopath. I prefer the term "evil genius."
This line activates pity mode. I don't want to be unbeatable, 'cause then it'd be even sweeter when I win ten times in a row!

state.text: This line deactivates pity mode. Enjoy losing again!

case.state: Ha! None for me!
Gimme ~cards.text~!
Would you look at that, another good hand. I'm so surprised.
I never get tired of coming out on top!
Think you've finally got me beat this round? I can guarantee you don't!
Huh. A pair's not exactly solid. Not sure how I ended up with that...
Only a pair, eh? Should'a got better than that, but I guess I am still at the mercy of chance...
The heck? A pair? I should be doing better than that.
Aw crap, I miscalculated something somewhere...
Crap, this hand didn't turn out how I meant it to... Don't try and tell me "It's karma!" Karma isn't real! I would know!
That's life right there: No matter how smart you are, no matter how many correct moves you make, you can get screwed over with total junk.
"Portal Master," huh? Can't say I've ever heard of those, but I'm good at learning my enemies on the fly, so it doesn't matter.
I dress like exactly what you'd expect a girl like me to dress like when she sleeps. And that's all I'll say.
Oh, that's all? Just a mage? Like I'm afraid.
You blow a fuse or something, Icebreath? I'm right here!
Ha! Yep, I know that chick. She's so coarse to every that no one wants to help her out of that shackle! Doesn't bother me, of course, but I enjoy her struggles too much to help!
Real shame about him. That sword of his gives him so much destructive potential. What a waste of an ancient magical artifact!
Nah, she doesn't rob banks anymore. She's Von Grimblade's girlfriend now, he's helping her learn to use her powers for good. Like turning into a shark is good for anything other than eating people!
Sure, why not? The bigger I am, the bigger my potential for destruction becomes!
Oh, we're actually giving out names here? Alright. I'm Natasha. Surprised ya didn't already know that. I'm a pretty big villain.
You've probably heard my name on the news enough times, but I'm Natasha. And if you haven't seen me on the news before, I'm known for bad things. Lots and lots of bad things.

You've probably already heard of me, but I'm Natasha Cerebellum -- yes, the daughter of Dr. Cerebellum, the guy who made robot arms possible. Isn't it great that you have him to thank for me and my ability to thrash you?
You know how some people just want to watch the world burn? That's me. Hi. Natasha Cerebellum.
What if I told you I'm going easy on you right now? You have no way of verifying, so you'd just have to take my word for it!
Oh, hey, by the way, I may be evil, but non-con is not my thing. I save the life-ruining stuff for people I truly hate, anyway.
These aren't my only pair of arms, by the way. I've also got a stripped-down version of these that I can wear sleeves over, and I've been experimenting with a bigger, badder pair too.
Sure, putting up a middle finger can be an easy way to upset someone, but that's incredibly trite and not nearly personal enough for my tastes.
Frankly, you should be impressed I've been cheating. You have any idea how hard it is counting cards, making sure I don't pull something that shouldn't be possible?

If it bothers you that I don't curse despite being a full grown adult in an adults-only situation, then mission freakin' accomplished! It's just one of many little things I do to get under people's skin!
In case it wasn't already super clear: I'm dangerous, so don't try anything "funny," alright? Or do! Give me a reason to bust your jaw!
In case you're wondering, no, I don't have a single kind bone in my body. Bones aren't kind, stupid. Ha!
Any chance any of you are into BDSM? Beatin' and bruisin's kinda my thing. Well, more of a hobby than a fetish.
Any of you into being tied up? I've got enough tether for everyone!
Anyone mind if I get a fire going? I'm not cold, I just like fire.
I'm gonna kick Grizelda's butt if she's not resting when I get home. Her legs are gonna fall apart without a tune up...
Don't worry, I'm not gonna ditch my arms just to pass another round. What kind of weirdo would do something like that?

Hey, just so you know, I find the term "buck teeth" offensive. "Overbite," "rabbit teeth," and "super muncher" are fine, but "buck" invokes the imagery of a deer's ugly freakin' antlers and I won't stand for it!
One time I pulled that "bucket over the door" prank just for the heck of it. Sometimes you just gotta play the classics.
Contrary to popular belief, I actually love people. I just love toying with them more!
Shame Nero Forte's dead. It was fun watching him fail horrendously at being a hero! Seriously, that guy caused more destruction accidentally than I do when I'm actively trying!
You know what's fun? Talking to people before they've had their morning coffee! Super easy way to annoy people! Joke's on them for becoming reliant on caffine!
I love how upset people can get when their favorite piece of media doesn't end how they wanted it to! People can be such slaves to their own expectations sometimes! It's hilarious!
So, what's the meanest thing you've ever done? Personally, I've done so many mean things that I can't pick just one "meanest."

I hate a lot of things, but you know what I really, truly hate? Conformity. People mindlessly doing what everyone else is doing. Don't you just hate that? If I catch any of you doing that, I will smash your toes!
Yes, the arms're metal, and yes, they're cold. Wanna feel?
Yes, the arms're metal, and yes, they have weapons stashed in 'em. Wanna see?
Get a good look at my mechanical arms yet? These bad girls are packed with a flamethrower, a bomb launcher, and my special "chaos cannon!"
Get a good look at my mechanical arms yet? I can detach 'em at each joint for grappling, and I can electrify every inch of the tether!
Y'know, despite being so incredibly evil, I'm actually pretty chill most of the time. Go ahead, try and make me angry! I bet'cha can't!
I love when people try to talk in secret around me by using another language. The look on their faces when I chime in regardless because I speak that language too never gets old!
Tired of my winning streak? Think I'm cheating? You're free to frisk me for cards. You won't feel a thing!
This line brings my AI down a bit so I'm easier to beat. Don't want you whinin' about me being unbeatable in bug reports.
This line brings my AI down further. Gotta make sure you can actually get to the punchline of this joke character!
This line resets my AI, provided I'm not winning. Theoretically, this should make beating me feasible without compromising the believability of my cheating.
Yes, I'm human -- and before you ask, yes, it's all natural, and so is my hair.
Nope! Where's the fun in having someone else do your evil for you?
Crap. The odds of me being the first to lose are, suffice to say, not good. This shouldn't be possible...
You actually got me once. Dang. You're already surpassing expectations -- which, granted, is easy to do when expectations are extremely low.
Huh. You got me again. That's almost impressive. No, really. You're playing against an evil genius here!
You're not cheating, are you? 'Cause that would be evil, and then I'd have to give you kudos!
How much would you hate me if I pulled out one of my teeth to pass this round? I'm not gonna do it, I just wanna know how mad you'd be!
You're lucky I value my arms. Do you realize how many nuts, bolts, and wires I could be pulling out of them to stall with?
Y'know, I'm not used to losing. It's a nice change of pace!
Well crap, I really didn't think I'd lose this much...
Seriously? What, did I not cheat hard enough?
Hey, you're actually getting me out of my underwear now. Yes, stockings are underwear. I will fight you on that!
Nope! I'm prefectly healthy -- could probably live 'till I'm 100, even! My skin and hair have always been like this!
My arms, for one thing -- well, technically two things. You won't find prosthetics likes these on store shelves, especially because they contain my special "chaos cannon."
You're gonna have to try a lot harder than that to see my underwear. As you can guess, I don't like making things easy!
Now's the part where you see I actually have really frilly, delicate panties on that makes you see my character differently, huh? Yeah right!
What kind of panties do you think I have on? Skull-patterned? Black and white stripes? Maybe something pink and frilly?
So what do you think took my arms? Car crash? Lab accident? Or maybe some crazy bet I lost?
Any guesses as to what took my arms? Freak accident? Mishandling a lawnmower? Maybe some rogue neighborhood dog?

I bet you think some super hero made me lose my arms, huh? Ripped 'em off with super strength, or perhaps they got overzealous with their magic, or maybe even tricked me into hurting myself with my own invention?
Too bad for you, I've got a bra on! Gotta keep the girls in place when I'm out swinging around kicking people in the face!
Keep it in your pants, I've got a bra on under this. Why wouldn't I have a bra on under this?
Confession time: I've been cheating this whole game. I've got cards hidden in my arms. The fact that you got this far is almost impressive, so I won't deny you what you came for.

Alright, honesty time: I've been cheating this whole game. There's cards in my arms. But I'm nothing if not a woman of principle, so I'll see this match through to it's end. I came here to win, and that's what I'm gonna do!
Whatever. I'm far too persistent to back out now!
Yes, I am petty enough to want to win here. Winning is something that's nice, and I can't let anyone have anything nice!
You're lucky I don't stink. As easy as it'd be to torment people by having poor hygene, I much prefer when people realize that the chick who just thrashed them smells better than they do!
I'm really not much of a leg-centric girl. I mean, clearly I let my arms do most of my work. I can kick ya so hard it'll knock the wind out of ya, though!
It starts a sub-atomic domino effect that causes a forceful explosion wherever I aim it, with unpredictable lightning offshoots as a natural byproduct!

state.text: Why not ask ~player~? ~player.ifMale(He|She)~ looks like a good guesser!
Weren't you paying attention? I already told you! Not my fault you can't remember! ~player~, why don't you remind them?
~player~ is the know-it-all here. Why don't you ask ~player.ifMale(him|her)~ what happened to my arms?
Oh, I'm sorry, I forgot to ask the puppet master if I have permission to exposite. May I share that story, ~player.ifMale(master|mistress)~ ~player~?

case.state: If you expected something nicer looking, then you haven't been paying attention to just who the heck I am!
Oh, I'm sorry, did you expect something with butterflies or strawberries or something else cute on it, symbolizing the soft interior under a rough facade? It's just underwear, dolts!
Be thankful you got both boots and not just one. I guess I'm just in a generous mood!
Congratulations, you got my boots off. Your poker skill is equal to that of simply coming home.
Nope! I cut them off myself! Well, my sister did it for me, 'cause y'know, arms, but it was my idea! I couldn't resist giving myself mechanical arms filled with evil technology!
Nope! I asked for them to be cut off! Metal arms make me so much more evil!
Well, maybe I'll just keep you guessing! I don't owe you my backstory!
Maybe I'll just make you keep guessing until you get it right. There's only, like, a thousand ways to remove someone's arms!
Listen here: Being evil? My choice. These arms? My choice. Not getting my overbite corrected? My choice. Nothing about me is an accident, got it?
Sometimes the truth is greater than fiction. Sometimes life disappoints. One of those applies to the story about my arms, but I won't tell you which!
What am I, some kind of cheesy movie villain that exposites her backstory to every opponent she faces? Get real!
It was no accident! It was a decision! A step towards becoming a better villain! Who knows what body part I might lob off next!
I can't exactly do my villain business in lingerie -- and yes, I do have villain business to attend to when we're done.

Oh? Did you expect me to take off my stockings first? Nuh uh! Outter layers first, then underwear! Stockings are worn under shoes, so that makes them underwear! I am very particular about this distinction!
That's right, I don't wear shorts under my skirt. Like I care if anyone sees up my skirt, it just means I get to punch 'em for being a perv!
So there. And I'm not gonna stop cheating, ether! You're gonna have to earn my crotch!

Leaving in the middle of a strip poker match would hardly be a fun way to screw with you, anyway. Like, "oh no, you didn't get to see my genitals, just like you do with a majority of the people you meet in life. How clever."
Count yourself lucky I put my evil tech in my arms and not my boobs!
You think even for a second that I'm ashamed to be nude? Like, seriously? Really? Me? Yeah right!
The sight of nudity obviously makes most people happy, but it makes some people uncomfortable too, so naturally I gotta have that ready as a tool in my arsenal.
If you didn't believe that my hair was naturally pink before, I've just proven my case beyond reasonable doubt.
If you're a foot-fetishist, I'll gladly give you a close look at my feet in the form of a swift kick to the face!
If you think a footjob from me would be better than a handjob, you're overestimating how gentle I'd be with my feet!
Hey, pal, you know the whole catsuit thing is only cute when girls do it, right? On you, it just looks like you lost a bet.
Hey, bub, didn'tcha get the memo? You're supposed to dress as something frightening. No goon worth anything is gonna be intimidated by Cat Man.
... Oh, I get it, you're a cat so you disarm people with cuteness, right? Too bad for you, I'm a dog person!
Pffft! If your goal with the cat costume was to get your opponents to laugh themselves to death, it's working!
Listen, bud, there was only one male-identifying individual who could make a cat-themed hero work, and he's dead. So what's that mean for you?
Well, if I'm gonna be stuck in a match with a freakin' mascot, at least it's the one known for breaking through walls...
Well, at least you're not one of those furry mascots...
I wanna make a joke like "If I get thirsty during the match, I can at least knock you over and take a drink," but actually, I hate sugary drinks.

I wanna make a joke like "If I get thirsty during the match, I can at least knock you over and take a drink," but actually, I hate sugary drinks, so that joke is inaccurate. Also, if I actually do get thirsty, I'm screwed.
This guy's like the total opposite of me: Tall, buff, bald guy obsessed with cleaning... Obviously, I hate him.
You like to keep things clean, huh? I bet I could make a mess so big even you can't clean it all up!
I don't care how strong or fast or whatever this guy is, he won't last a minute against me!
Blanco, huh? Is that supposed to be your power level or something? Just wait until I show you the power of pink!
Tonto ebrio, puede que haya sido poderoso una vez, pero carece de poder de permanencia! Oh? Didn't think I could speak Spanish? Te lo dije, soy una persona de pueblo!
This character greatly offends me! Pasta is garbage!
Ugh, really? This guy had to be here? I cannot possibly understate just how much I hate pasta, and anyone who cooks it!
Aw man, I love Punch-Out! Hey, Joe, wanna go toe-to-toe?
Aw man, I love Punch-Out! You have no idea how many times I've knocked out the virtual you, Joe!
So... am I supposed to be afraid of this plush or something? 'Cause I can't be afraid of anything that's at the perfect football kick height.
Am I supposed to be offended by this plush calling me gay and implying I have a dick despite clearly being a cute girl? 'Cause it just looks like a sad attempt at trolling to me.
... Is this plush gonna try to get us to kill each other or something? Does it realize we're not even trapped here?
Hey, I've heard of you. You're that guy, uh... Super, uh... Ultimate... Hang on, it'll come to me...
Wait wait, I know you, you're... not Ultimate Ronin... not Flamebringer Extreme... uh... can't be Rocketpunch Tanaka... Justice Blade Plus Ultra...?

Lemme see if I can guess your backstory: You never knew your parents. You lost your childhood friend, and now refuse to ever lose a friend again, while also setting out to be the best whatever you said you'd be. Am I right? I bet I am!
I hope you have some actual powers, 'cause it just isn't fun beatin' up fools who think courage, determination, and a sword are all they need to dish out justice anymore...
You know that Yu-Gi-Oh is just a rip-off of Magic: The Gathering, right? If you want me to take you seriously, play that instead.
Finally, a card-based something-or-other that doesn't just use Tarot or French-print cards...
Yu-Gi-Oh was much cooler back when it was about various games and not just the Magic rip-off...
Cards? Pass. Anyone still play Dungeon Dice Monsters, though?

I know I'm supposed to have something real mean to say to this guy, and mean things are my thing, but... I really don't care. So he killed a dog and a daughter for status, big whoop. Not like he committed genocide or something!
I'm sure you want me to say something extra mean to this guy, but... it's not even worth it. Not like I have the moral high-ground here, anyway.
So this guy killed his dog and his daughter. Big whoop. Do you know how many people I know who've done far worse things for fun?
So this guy killed his dog and his daughter. Why should I care? What do I look like? Batman?
So this guy killed his dog and his daughter. Am I supposed to care? Do I even need to tell you how that could've been worse?
You expect me to hate this guy? I go to school to learn to be worse than him!
Oh, you think this guy's the worst? Don't study history, then. You'll quickly find out just how much more awful a human can be!
Suction cups? How primitive! Get with the times, loser! Grapple arms are where it's at!
Suction Cup Man? Geez, and I thought Kite Man was the pinnacle of lame...
Oh good, I was getting tired of simply cheating death. Now I can beat him outright!
Great going, ~player~. You broke something. You shouldn't be seeing this!
Oh... I think something broke. You shouldn't be seeing this.
Nice arm. Bet it doesn't compare to mine, though!
Tall, blonde, wearing blue... You that "blue paladin" I keep hearing about?
You must be Blue Paladin. I was expecting your armor to be more... modern.
You must be Ace, the Wonder Clown. Nice try, but I don't have coulrophobia!
Y'know, believe it or not, I've never met an evil clown -- and I go to villain school! Unless you're evil?
Ugh, those arms better be your only power. I am not dealing with another singing-power hero today...
Are those arms your only power? If so, you just met your superior!
Hey, did you dye your hair pink 'cause of me? Are you like my biggest fan or something?
Hey, we almost have the same haircut, 'cept yours is all pinned up. Do yourself a favor and let your hair down, those pins make your bangs look like big nostrils.
Hey shortie, you oughta let your hair down like mine. The messy look is much better than... whatever you call that.
You that "Magey Maggie" I keep hearing about? Can you teach me some magic or is it just "in your blood?"
... What's up with you?... Your hair is, like, the opposite of mine. Instead of pink and messy, it's blue and... well, still messy, but it looks more intentional.
Your hair is weird. It's like, messy, but still orderly. Do you wake up every morning and comb it into that specific pattern?
I know a being of chaos when I see one! You and I are gonna get along just fine, Fourarms!
Ahahaha! A ladybug? That's the best you got? Do you even have any powers, or are you just some chick in a silly suit?
I know there are a lot of bug-themed heroes, but are there seriously so many of you that a ladybug was the best you could do?
Pffft, sure, a ladybug hero. What next, Phasmid Man?
Ugh, I hate spiders... You'd better not have a spider-face under that hood!
Ugh, I hate spiders... If you have any resemblance to a spider, I'm out!
Ooh-ravity? Yoo-ravity? Uh-ravity? Ur-avity? How the heck do you say it? Whatever, point is, you're on my list of heroes to take down for bonus credits.
Judging by your name, I take it you've got gravity powers? What, do you make people heavier or something? Not gonna work with me, you can't make flames heavier!
"Starfire," huh? Well, at least one of those things is a thing I enjoy. Guess which!
Wait, did you say your name is "Coriander?" As in, Chinese parsley? What, are you gonna spice me into submission or something?
I know that walk. You don't have legs. I can get ya some robotic ones, but only on one condition: You use them for evil.

You got fake legs, huh? I can tell. My sister lost her legs too. Surprised you're not using better legs. Crappy ones like whatever you got weren't good enough for Griz, they shouldn't be for you either!
I can tell by the way you walk, you're walking on fakes. You should get better ones. There's all kinds of cool crap you can cram in that space.
Nice fake legs. Not. You oughta get robotic ones -- or better yet, get robotic arms, they're crazy rad.
Are you the statue that got John Linnell high, or we just playing with some statue for no reason?
Ha! Patrolling the beach, kicking down sandcastles. Classic villainy!
Hey, just so you know, once you get your sandcastle done, I'ma kick it down. It's more fun to kick it down when you build it with the express purpose of being kick-proof!
Am I about to be the beach bully who kicks down sandcastles? Yes. Yes I am.
Let it be known that I am not above simple beach bullying. I'll kick down a sandcastle at the drop of a hat.
Muffins...? So you got muffin powers? What, do you turn people into muffins or something?
Oh man, a genie? Sweet! Three wishes!... But honestly, I dunno what I'd wish for. My life's great!
Oh man! Genies are the best! Nothing better than making someone regret getting exactly what they wished for!
Ah! Finally, a doctor who gets me! Cybernetics are just the best!
Well, if it isn't the coolest doctor I've ever seen! I know who I'm callin' next time I need some shots!
Please tell me you use that arm to forcefully immunize anti-vaccine idiots! That's my freakin' dream!
You're the one everyone hates, huh? Guess that makes you my best friend!
I hear everyone hates you. You know what that earns you? My eternal and unwavering support!
Hey, aren't you one of the chicks from that Mioda girl's former band, or am I thinking of some other all-girl band that has band practice at tea time?
A literal goddess, huh? Guess it's time to become a JRPG protagonist, 'cause I'm totally gonna kick this goddess's butt!
You're a lawyer, huh? Defense or prosecution? Because with me on trial, your job is either going to be a total breeze or the biggest battle of your life.
Pffft! "Panty?" Seriously? That's the dumbest name I've ever heard! That's not even a good stripper name!
Geez, and I thought "Nero Forte" was a dumb name! Congratulations, "Panty," yours takes the cake!
An elf, huh? What kinds of powers do elves have? More than just good hearing, I hope!
Taking a break from making toys, eh? That's a Christmas joke, if you didn't catch it.
Fat jokes are too easy. I gotta think up some elf disses... which... are gonna be much harder, apparently, but much more worthwhile as a result!
Wait a minute, don't tell me you are the "Ultimate Ronin" I heard about? I was told that was a guy, and that he dresses like a cowboy... shame on me for believing that part, I guess...
